bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Diabetes Device Security&#8212;Use of Mobile Devices in Diabetes Control Contexts
IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Diabetes Device Security&#8212;Use of Mobile Devices in Diabetes Control Contexts

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines a framework for a connected electronic product security evaluation program, with specific requirements and guidance relating to digital diabetes devices and solutions, such as insulin pumps.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
